name: Zmerzlina
description:
Description

In this game you have to stack ice-cream scoops on a cone. It has simple but cool controls and funny physics.

For stacking different amounts of scoops you gain scores: 
1 scoop = +1 point
2 scoops = +4 points
3 scoops = +9 points
4 scoops = +16 points
5 scoops(max) = +50 points and the scoops stacked are cleared back to 0 

If a scoop falls you get -10 points.

Controls

Control your character dragging left mouse button / using arrow keys / WASD / touches.

Goal

The more points you got, the more difficult to play it becomes.
the GOAL is to reach 1000 points.

FOR BETTER EXPERIENCE YOU CAN DOWNLOAD IT  FOR ANDROID
